name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of the Arcane
description: A mystical staff that harnesses the power of arcane magic.
looks: The staff is made of polished ebony wood and is adorned with glowing arcane symbols. It emits a faint, pulsating glow.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power of arcane spells

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff infused with powerful healing magic.
looks: The staff has a smooth wooden handle with a glowing crystal orb at the top. It emits a soft, soothing light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits a healing aura, restoring HP to nearby allies.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword engulfed in flames, dealing fire damage to enemies.
looks: The Flaming Sword has a long, thin blade that glows with an intense heat. Flames dance along the edge of the blade, making it appear as if it is constantly on fire. The hilt is made of blackened steel, with a red gemstone set into the pommel.

special_effects.burning_slash: 20% chance to deal additional fire damage with each successful hit.

name: Sword of Destruction
description: A sword crafted with dark magic, capable of unleashing devastating attacks.
looks: The Sword of Destruction has a sinister black blade that seems to absorb light. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with dark gems.

special_effects.dark_soul: Absorbs the life force of enemies, restoring health to the wielder.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that harnesses the power of healing.
looks: The staff is made of smooth, polished wood and topped with a crystal orb that emits a soft, soothing glow.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Staff of Frost
description: A magical staff that harnesses the power of ice.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft with intricate carvings of icicles and snowflakes. At the top of the staff is a crystal orb that glows with a cold blue light.

special_effects.ice_shard: Has a chance to shoot a shard of ice at the target, dealing additional ice damage.

name: Adamantium Plate Armor
description: A legendary suit of plate armor forged from the rare and powerful metal known as adamantium.
looks: The armor is comprised of thick, overlapping plates of polished adamantium. It covers the wearer from head to toe, providing exceptional protection without sacrificing mobility.

name: Iron Sword
description: A standard iron sword commonly used by warriors and adventurers.
looks: The sword has a simple design with a straight steel blade and a hilt wrapped in leather for a better grip.
